changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text.
changelog.md.Lors de la supression d'un évènement les: When an event is deleted, the end actions are no longer executed
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug lors de l'inclusion\: Correction of a bug during the inclusion / exclusion of dates if these are excluded / included
changelog.md.Ajout d'une reprogrammation de tous évèn: Adding a reprogramming of all events every day at 00:00
changelog.md.Ajout de commande pour l'inclusion\/excl: Addition of order for the inclusion / exclusion of date from the scenarios
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'inclusion de d: Correction of a bug on the inclusion of date
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le \"jusqu'à\" s: Correction of a bug on "until" if the repetition is not a simple repetition
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les images de la: Correction of a bug on the images of the configuration page
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug lors du calcul de la: Correction of a bug during the calculation of the recurrence of events if no bound is defined
changelog.md.Lors de la réactivation de l'agenda si o: When reactivating the agenda if you are in an event, the start actions are launched
changelog.md.Suppression des commandes d'activations\: Deletion of activation / deactivation commands (to deactivate an agenda in a scenario you must now use the equipment deactivation function)

index.md.Plugin permettant de créer un agenda et: Plugin for creating an agenda and triggering actions (command or scenario)
index.md.La configuration est très simple, après: The configuration is very simple, after downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it and that's it
index.md.La configuration des équipements Agenda: The configuration of the Agenda equipment is accessible from the Plugins menu then Organization
index.md.Une fois dessus vous retrouvez alors la: Once on it you will find the list of your Agenda
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories)
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.définit le nombre de jours d'événements: sets the number of event days to display on the widget
index.md.défini le nombre maximum d'événements à: defines the maximum number of events to display on the dashboard
index.md.Ne pas afficher le statut et les command: Do not display status and activation / deactivation commands
index.md.permet de masquer le statut de l'agenda: allows you to hide the status of the calendar as well as the commands for activating or not activating it
index.md.affichage en dessous de la liste de tous: display below the list of all calendar events (click on it to edit the event directly)
index.md.permet d'ajouter un événement à l'agenda: add an event to the calendar
index.md.Affichage d'une vue type agenda avec tou: Display of an agenda type view with all the events you can move in, choose to display it by week or day, move events (drag and drop) and a click on an event will open its editing window
index.md.Partie la plus importante du plugin, c'e: The most important part of the plugin, this is where you will be able to configure your event
index.md.permet d'ajouter une icône devant le nom: allows you to add an icon in front of the name of your equipment (to do this, click on "Choose an icon")
index.md.permet de choisir la couleur de votre év: allows you to choose the color of your event (a check mark also allows you to make it transparent)
index.md.permet de choisir la couleur du texte de: allows you to choose the color of your event text
index.md.Ne pas afficher dans le dashboard: Do not show in the dashboard
index.md.permet de ne pas afficher cet événement: allows not to display this event on the widget
index.md.Permet de choisir la ou les actions à fa: Allows you to choose the action (s) to do when launching the event
index.md.Pour ajouter une action il suffit de cli: To add an action just click on the + button at the end of the line then you will have a button to search for an order once it is found you will have the choice of options if it has any
index.md.Vous pouvez ajouter autant d'action que: You can add as much action as you want
index.md.Il est possible de modifier l'ordre des: It is possible to modify the order of actions by holding / dragging it
index.md.Il est possible de faire les memes actio: It is possible to do the same actions as in the scenarios (see
index.md.Idem à l'action de début mais cette fois: Same as the start action but this time it is the action (s) to perform at the end of the event
index.md.C'est ici que se trouve toute la gestion: This is where all the time management of your event is located
index.md.permet de définir l'événement sur toute: allows to define the event over the whole day
index.md.Permet d'inclure un autre événement dans: Allows you to include another event in your current event
index.md.Par exemple, si vous avez un événement A: For example, if you have an event A repeated every Monday, and you include this event A in your current event, then this event will be automatically repeated every Monday
index.md.permet de forcer une date d'occurence, v: allows to force an occurrence date, you can put several by separating them with, (commas), you can also define a range with
index.md.permet de dire que votre événement est r: lets say that your event is repeated (if this box is not checked you will not have the following options)
index.md.permet de spécifier le mode de répétitio: allows to specify the repeat mode, either simple
index.md.tous les jours, tous les X jours…​ ou ré: every day, every X days ... or repetition every 1st, 2nd ... to repeat an event every 3rd Monday of the month for example (the following options may be different depending on this choice)
index.md.\\[mode répétition simple seulement\\] p: \ [simple repeat mode only \] allows you to define the frequency of repetition of the event (eg every 3 days or every 2 months…)
index.md.\\[mode répétition le premier, le deuxiè: \ [repeat mode the first, the second… only \] allows you to choose a repeat every 2nd Monday of the month for example
index.md.permet de restreindre la répétition à ce: allows you to restrict repetition to certain days of the week
index.md.permet de restreindre l'événement seulem: allows to restrict the event only on public holidays or to exclude public holidays
index.md.donne la date de fin d'occurence de l'év: gives the end date of occurrence of the event
index.md.permet de mettre en exclusion cet événem: allows to exclude this event according to another calendar (to avoid for example that 2 contradictory events meet together)
index.md.idem que \"Inclure\" mais cette fois pou: same as "Include" but this time to exclude dates
index.md.Les jours feriés sont ceux Francais et u: Public holidays are French and only French this does not work for other countries
index.md.En haut à droite vous avez 3 boutons, un: At the top right you have 3 buttons, one to delete, one to save and one to duplicate
index.md.Lors du clic sur ce dernier jeedom vous: When clicking on this last jeedom displays the event resulting from the duplication so that you can change the name for example
index.md.Il ne faut donc pas oublier de sauvegard: So don't forget to save following a click on the duplicate button
index.md.donne la liste des événements en cours s: gives a list of current events separated by commas, to use it in the simplest scenario and to use the operator contains (matches) or does not contain (not matches), for example
index.md.matches \"\/Anniv\/\", sera vrai si dans: matches "/ Anniv /", will be true if in the list of current events there is a "Anniv
index.md.permet depuis un scénario d'ajouter une: allows from a scenario to add a date to an event (be careful if you change the name of the event you will have to correct it in the scenario too)
index.md.Vous pouvez mettre plusieurs évenement s: You can put several events separated by
index.md.permet depuis un scénario d'exclure une: allows from a scenario to exclude a date from an event (be careful if you change the name of the event you will have to correct it in the scenario too)
index.md.Il est possible d'utiliser la commande \: It is possible to use the "In progress" command as a trigger in a scenario, each update of the information will trigger the execution of the scenario
index.md.Cependant, Il estréférable d'utiliser ce: However, it is preferable to use this command in a programmed scenario with a test on the value
